Design Systemss

All the parts and people serving a portfolio of products – make teams more efficient and experiences more cohesive.

It’s not just a style guide. Instead, modern enterprises invest in tools and practices so teams can make innovative, beautiful products together. EightShapes can guide you there.

Design’s future is modular. It’s always been components.

Designers code more and are delivering their work as a toolkit of interdependent parts. Thinking modularly is now a key trait for today’s high performing teams. Everyone’s thinking atomic.

EightShapes has been thinking in @components for years, helping clients start and sustain component libraries for nearly 10 years and sharing the practices with 2009’s Modular Web Design.

What We Do

  • System Discovery

    Partner with EightShapes to assess your landscape, plan your parts, products, and people, and start your system's formative period.

    • System Build

    Hire us to build the library with your or for you as a project, and even maintain it as a managed product over months or years.

    Coaching

    Ask hard questions. Share your ideas. Present the plan. Get straight advice to make changes that matter with 1-on-1 and small team coaching.

    Talks & Workshops

    Expose the benefits and spur discussions in your organization to kickstart your efforts with prepared talks and customized workshops.

    Workshops

    EightShapes present talks and workshops to in-house teams. While available out-of-the-box, we usually customize presentations and tailor activities so teams get the most out of an engagement.

    Intro to Design Systems

    Learn system fundamentals and activities to start, spread and sustain a system for teams large and small.

    ¼ or ½ day

    Modular Web Design

    Design modularly, inventory components, and organize style, elements, components, grounded in a hands-on activity to cut up your experience.

    ¼ or ½ day

    Designing Living Style Guides

    Plan, structure, and design a web-based style guide experience, including pages for code, guidelines, and custom topics.

    ¼ or ½ day

    Sustaining Design Systems

    Transition from a project finished to product maintained roadmapping, a backlog, and aligning with product teams.

    ¼ or ½ day

    From Governing to Sharing

    Transition your culture towards sharing, participation, & contribution.

    ¼ day

    Component Cut Up

    Dive into an immersive activity to slice up, group, label and prioritize your components.
